World First IOTA Soccer Team . Plays in tournaments to promote Cambrian Adoption of IOTA.

Soccer(Football Association) has 4 Billion followers worldwide and is the most popular sport in the world.

Soccer is the perfect launchpad to promote proliferation of IOTA in billion use cases.

We intend to make IOTA - a force to reckon with in Crypto.
